name: 1BR
description: This rhythm game is similar to Dance Dance Revolution or OSU Mania BUT... there is only one row to press. Use Z and X or customise your keys and dominate this one game :| Ok 1 game isn't a lot but I just started developing this game and I don't have time to make more maps at the moment but if I get enough people playing this game I'll make sure to add more maps, but at the moment it's just a little demo, anyways enjoy the game :)
